casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tilmon Charles GOLPHIN 441A98-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2017 Jay H. Ferguson, Attorney at Law, Kenneth J. Rose, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Golphin, Tilmon Charles. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney Genera, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of N.C. James E. Williams, Jr., Attorney at Law, Carrboro, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2017 by State of NC for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of June 2017." Beasley, J. recused
